label: specifiedFinancialAdjustment
comment: A financial adjustment specified for this header trade settlement.
A financial adjustment specified for this line trade settlement.
A financial adjustment specified for this subordinate line trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: A correction or modification to reflect actual financial conditions.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

The information, at a subordinate line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
